Bartlett.WXMX:
WXMX is a commercial mainstream rock radio station near Memphis, TN. It is owned by Cumulus Media and is branded as "98.1 The Max". The station's studios are located at the Memphis Radio Group building in East Memphis, and the transmitter site is in Cordova, Tennessee.
Notable local programming includes a very humorous and topical morning talk show called Drake and Zeke in the Morning.
